name: Chick The Dog
description:
Chick The Dog

Merge the dogs with the chicken by getting them close. But beware of the wolves!

This was made for the Rusty Jam #2

Controls:

  • WASD/ZQSD to move the camera. 
  • Mouse wheel to zoom/dezoom
  • Mouse to attract dogs and chickens
  • Click on the wolves to scare them away

Credits:

  • @Uriopass for the art+programming
  • Most sounds from freesound.org and some made by @Uriopass
  • Music: I Knew a Guy by Kevin MacLeod | https://incompetech.com/
